about_the_game:
In the game, you will use a slingshot to shoot furry animals at enemy structures. Your goal is to destroy all of the enemy's buildings and defenses to win each level. However, you must be careful because enemies will be shooting back at you with their own weapons, and you must dodge their shots.

The game consists of multiple levels, each with a unique design and difficulty. You will encounter various obstacles on your way, such as walls, barriers, and hard-to-reach areas. In addition, you will have access to various types of animals, each with their own unique abilities and characteristics.

Capture the planet: Cute War is a great game that will allow you to have fun and enjoy your time. If you love arcade games and cute animals, then this project is definitely for you.

Features:
  • Using a slingshot and fluffy animals to destroy structures is a unique and interesting game mechanic that sets Capture the planet: Cute War apart from other games.
  • Multiple levels and various obstacles on the path to victory - each level in the game has its own unique design and difficulty, making the game more engaging and diverse.
  • Variety of animals and their abilities - the game features different types of animals, each with their own unique abilities and characteristics, allowing players to choose the most suitable animals for different situations.
  • Cute and fun design - the game is made in bright colors and features cute fluffy animals, making it more attractive to both children and adult players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Capture the planet: Cute War is an exciting arcade game where you play as heroic animals fighting for their life and freedom on a planet captured by evil enemies.
